languages.text: {n}С ледяной улыбкой херетек протягивает Паскалю инфопластину, по которому пляшут богохульные зеленые знаки.{/n} "Хочешь узнать все о себе, обо мне, об увечном охотнике, об Амарнате? Абсолютно все".

{n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"
languages.original_text: {n}С ледяной улыбкой херетек протягивает Паскалю инфопластину, по которому пляшут богохульные зеленые знаки.{/n} "Хочешь узнать все о себе, обо мне, об увечном охотнике, об Амарнате? Абсолютно все".

traits.locale_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate with dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}氷のような微笑を浮かべると、異端技術は不敬な緑のシンボルが付いたデータスレートをパスカルに手渡した。{/n}「あなた自身について、私について、負傷したハンターについて、そしてアマルナトについて、全て知りたいのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}氷のような微笑を浮かべると、異端技術は不敬な緑のシンボルが付いたデータスレートをパスカルに手渡した。{/n}「あなた自身について、私について、負傷したハンターについて、そしてアマルナトについて、全て知りたいのか？」
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}德曼兹脸上带着冰冷的微笑，将自己的数据板递给了帕斯卡。数据板上，充满亵渎意味的绿色符号正在翩翩起舞。{/n}“你想了解一切吗？关于你自己、关于我、关于残损猎手、还有阿玛纳特的一切？真真正正的一切？”
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}德曼兹脸上带着冰冷的微笑，将自己的数据板递给了帕斯卡。数据板上，充满亵渎意味的绿色符号正在翩翩起舞。{/n}“你想了解一切吗？关于你自己、关于我、关于残损猎手、还有阿玛纳特的一切？真真正正的一切？”
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Mit eisigem Lächeln übergibt der Häretekt Pasqal seinen Datablock mit den tanzenden, blasphemischen grünen Symbolen.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr alles über Euch wissen, über mich, den verstümmelten Hunter, über Amarnat? Absolut alles?"
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit eisigem Lächeln übergibt der Häretekt Pasqal seinen Datablock mit tanzenden, blasphemischen grünen Symbolen.{/n} "Möchtet Ihr alles über Euch wissen, über mich, den verstümmelten Hunter, über Amarnat? Absolut alles?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Avec un sourire glacial, l'hérétek tend à Pasqal sa plaque de données sur laquelle dansent des symboles blasphématoires verdâtres.{/n} « Vous voulez savoir tout ce qu'il y a à savoir sur vous-même, sur moi, sur le Chasseur mutilé et sur Amarnat ? Absolument tout ? »
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un sourire glacial, l'hérétek tend à Pasqal sa plaque de données, sur laquelle dansent des symboles blasphématoires verdâtres.{/n} « Vous voulez savoir tout ce qu'il y a à savoir sur vous-même, sur moi, sur le Chasseur mutilé et sur Amarnat ? Absolument tout ? »
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Con una sonrisa gélida, el heretek entrega a Pasqal la tablilla de datos que muestra los blasfemos y danzantes glifos verdes.{/n} «¿Desea saberlo todo sobre usted mismo, sobre mí, sobre el Cazador Lisiado, sobre Amarnat? ¿Absolutamente todo?».
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con una sonrisa gélida, el heretek entrega a Pasqal la tablilla de datos con los blasfemos y danzantes glifos verdes.{/n} «¿Desea saberlo todo sobre usted mismo, sobre mí, sobre el Cazador Lisiado, sobre Amarnat? ¿Absolutamente todo?».
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements

languages.text: {n}Tekâfir, buz gibi bir gülümsemeyle Pasqal'a databelasını veriyor ve yeşil, kâfirce sembollerin dansını gösteriyor.{/n} "Kendin hakkında, benim hakkımda, Yaralı Avcı hakkında, Amarnat hakkında her şeyi bilmek istiyor musun? Bütün her şeyi?"
languages.original_text: {n}With an icy smile, the heretek hands Pasqal his data-slate showing the dancing blasphemous green symbols.{/n} "Do you want to know everything about yourself, about me, about the Maimed Hunter, about Amarnat? Absolutely everything?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekâfir buz gibi bir gülümsemeyle Pasqal'a databelasını veriyor ve yeşil, kâfirce sembollerin dansını gösteriyor.{/n} "Kendin hakkında, benim hakkımda, Yaralı Avcı hakkında, Amarnat hakkında her şeyi bilmek istiyor musun? Bütün her şeyi?"
traits.speaker: PasqalQuest_Dements
